tr.githubAciklama: Karakter verilerini GitHub deponuza kaydetmek için lütfen aşağıdaki bilgileri girin. Bu bilgiler sadece sizin tarayıcınızda saklanacaktır.
tr.pozisyonEtkilesimPlaceholder: Örn: Lena ve Kayra şezlonglarda uzanmış, birbirlerine dönük sohbet ediyorlar...
tr.ortamArkaPlanPlaceholder: Örn: Kalabalık bir yaz plajı, altın rengi kumlar, denizde yüzen insanlar...
tr.karakterSecUyarisi: Stilini düzenlemek için önce 'KARAKTERLER' sekmesinden bir karakter seçin.
tr.aiSahneleriOlustur: AI Reji Asistanı ile Sahne Kurgula
tr.corePromptUyarisi: Çekirdek prompt, karakter tutarlılığı için önerilen 1700 karakter sınırını aşıyor.
tr.etkilesimGirUyarisi: Lütfen bir eylem ve konumlandırma istemi girin.
tr.karakterSecimUyarisi: Lütfen önce en az bir karakter seçin.
tr.ortamTanimUyarisi: Lütfen önce ortam tanımı oluşturun veya manuel olarak girin.
tr.promptOlusturmaUyarisi: Lütfen önce 'Sahne {sceneNumber}' için tam prompt oluşturun.
tr.onceFotoPromptUyarisi: Video prompt'u oluşturmak için önce fotoğraf prompt'unu oluşturmalısınız.
tr.apiGorselBOSDondu: Görüntü oluşturulamadı. API boş yanıt döndürdü.
tr.gecersizFormatHata: Stil önerisi alınken geçersiz formatta yanıt alındı.

description.tr: Son derece detaylı ve gerçekçi, 4K çözünürlük.

VISUAL_STYLES.prompt: photorealistic, professional photography, 4K UHD, tack-sharp focus, high detail, detailed skin texture, sharp and detailed eyes, realistic lighting, anamorphic lens bokeh, HDR10+, high dynamic range, rich color grading, Dolby Vision look, atmospheric depth. Critical Note: Avoid any artistic styles like anime, manga, cartoon, illustration, painting, 3D render, CGI, or stylized effects. Maintain absolute photorealism.

description.tr: Geniş dinamik aralık, dramatik aydınlatma ve film estetiği.
description.en: Wide dynamic range, dramatic lighting, and film aesthetic.

VISUAL_STYLES.prompt: cinematic still, film grain, anamorphic lens flare, rich color grading, dramatic lighting, high dynamic range, atmospheric depth. Critical Note: Must look like a real movie still, not an illustration or 3D render.

description.tr: Canlı, parlak renkler ve stilize, el çizimi sanat eseri.
description.en: Vibrant colors and stylized, hand-drawn artwork.

VISUAL_STYLES.prompt: anime style, cel-shading, vibrant colors, clean outlines, dynamic action pose, detailed background art, 2D illustration, manga-inspired shading, Japanese animation aesthetic, hand-drawn textures

description.tr: Yumuşak dokular, canlı renkler ve iyimser atmosfer.
description.en: Soft textures, vivid colors, and an upbeat atmosphere.

VISUAL_STYLES.prompt: Pixar style, 3D CGI animation, soft textures, stylized lighting, vivid colors, playful mood, exaggerated expressions, subsurface scattering, cartoon rendering, clean smooth shading

description.tr: Suluboya arka planlar ve pastel renk paletleri.
description.en: Watercolor backgrounds and pastel color palettes.

VISUAL_STYLES.prompt: Studio Ghibli style, watercolor background, soft pastel palette, whimsical fantasy setting, hand-painted look, natural scenery, magical realism, warm light tones, dreamy atmosphere, Japanese anime fantasy

SHOT_SCALES.shortPrompt: Extreme wide shot, establishing the scene with a vast panoramic view.
SHOT_SCALES.prompt: Extreme wide shot, using a 14mm lens for a vast panoramic perspective, establishing the scene with an epic, sweeping view. The subject appears small, emphasizing the grand scale of the environment. Deep focus ensures clarity from foreground to background, creating an immersive, cinematic feel. Consistent scale and positioning.

SHOT_SCALES.shortPrompt: Wide shot, showing the subject's full body in relation to their surroundings.
SHOT_SCALES.prompt: Wide shot, captured with a 24mm lens, showing the subject's full body in relation to their surroundings. This shot provides balanced environmental context, framed with a natural depth of field for clear, cinematic storytelling. Maintains consistent character proportions and positioning.

SHOT_SCALES.shortPrompt: Medium shot, framing the subject from the waist up.
SHOT_SCALES.prompt: A medium shot taken with a 50 mm lens to mimic the human eye, framing the subject from the waist up. Natural human perspective, cinematic balance, sharp focus on subject movement, 4K resolution, high detail. This creates a perfect, natural, and balanced perspective for capturing interactions and body language with sharp focus.

SHOT_SCALES.shortPrompt: Close-up, framing the head and shoulders.
SHOT_SCALES.prompt: Close-up, shot on an 85mm prime lens, framing the head and shoulders to capture intimate emotions. A shallow depth of field creates beautiful cinematic bokeh, drawing all attention to the subject's expressive facial details and tack-sharp eyes. Consistent facial positioning and lighting.

SHOT_SCALES.shortPrompt: Extreme close-up, focusing on a single, tiny detail.
SHOT_SCALES.prompt: Extreme close-up, using a 100mm macro lens, focusing on a single, tiny detail like an eye or a texture. Hyper-sharp focus and an ultra-shallow depth of field create a dramatic, cinematic highlight on micro-details. Consistent detail focus and quality.

Over-the-shoulder shot, with a 50mm lens, creating a conversational, point-of-view perspective. The foreground shoulder is softly blurred, guiding the viewer's eye to the main subject with natural depth and cinematic composition. Consistent perspective and positioning.
